April 25, 1967
The Honorable Harley Staggers
Chairman
House Interstate and Foreign Commerce
Committee
Suite 2125 Rayburn Building
Washington, D.C.
Dear Mr. Chairmans
Enclosed is a letter from Mrs. Marjorie Newman
of Florida State University.
Mrs. Newmanâ€™s letter raises several points with
which I am in agreement concerning the title of any bill
which is reported out of your committee providing for public
financial support for educational television and radio.
X am confident that should your committee report
out such a bill educational radio will be given the full
recognition which it deserves, both in the title and sub*
stance of the bill.
Kindest regards.
Sincerely,
DBF sFsm
